Package poised

Class Person

java.lang.Object
poised.Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Architect, Customer, Engineer, Manager
public abstract class Person extends Object
Parent class that captures and edits the information of people set as attributes of the Project object. Person is the non-instantiable abstract parent class of the instantiable Manager, Engineer Architect and Customer subclasses.
Author:
Megan Bisschoff
See Also:
  • Manager.java
  • Engineer.java
  • Architect.java
  • Customer.java

      public String getFullName()
      The 'getter' and 'setter' methods gets and sets the values of the fullName, contactNumber, email and address fields for the Manager, Engineer Architect and Customer objects.
      Returns:
      a person's full name, contact number, email and address.

      toString in class Object

    • capturePersonData

      public void capturePersonData(Person personType)
      Captures the fullname, contact number, email and address of an object from the respective subclass of the Person type. Prompts the user for input and sets the fullName, contactNumber, email, and address.

      Input is requested until the user input is validated for each object field not being equal to "none" as set in the objects attributes.

      Parameters:
      personType - an object from the Manager, Engineer Architect and Customer subclass.

    • editPersonData

      public void editPersonData(Person personType)
      Edits and recaptures the fullname, contact number, email and address of an object from the respective subclass of the Person type. Prompts the user for input and sets the fullName, contactNumber, email, and address.

      Input is requested until the user input is validated and set for each feild.

      Parameters:
      personType - an object from the Manager, Engineer Architect or Customer subclass.

    • updateManagerInDB

      public void updateManagerInDB(Project selectedProject) throws SQLException
      Method gets the Managers fullname, contact number, email and address of the selected project. Establishes connection with the DB and executes an sql query to update the Managers table.
      Parameters:
      selectedProject -
      Throws:
      SQLException
